metadataAttributes.Title: Executive Data Science Specialization
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Be The Leader Your Data Team Needs. Learn to lead a data science team that generates first-rate analyses in four courses.
metadataAttributes.Skills: Data Science, Data Management, Data Analysis, Communication, Leadership, Machine Learning, Project, Team Building, Management, Team Management, Interpretation, Exploratory Data Analysis,
